import React from 'react' import './Form.css' import TextWithCounter from './TextWithCounter.js' import axios from 'axios' class Form extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { fname: '', lname: '', email: '', message: '' } this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } onChange = (e) => { console.log(e) this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const { fname, lname, email, message} = this.state console.log(fname + ' ' + lname + ': ' + email + 'a ' + message + ' b') return false } render() { const { fname, lname, email, message } = this.state return
